New Records: India recorded their biggest win against Bangladesh in T20Is with an 86-run victory.
Key Match Events: Nitish Kumar Reddy scored 74 off 34 balls and took 2 wickets for 23 runs.
Reddy and Rinku put up a crucial 108-run stand for the fourth wicket.
Arshdeep Singh claimed the wicket of Parvez Hossain Emon.
Washington Sundar took the wicket of Najmul Hossain Shanto.
Varun Chakaravarthy dismissed Litton Das on his first ball.
Mahmudullah scored 41 off 39 balls in his penultimate T20I.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at the Arun Jaitley Cricket Stadium in New Delhi.
Reddy received a standing ovation after his innings.
Bangladesh's pace trio of Tanzim Hasan, Mustafizur Rehman, and Taskin Ahmed troubled the Indian top-order.
